notes: In June 2015, the Province of Ontario launched a review of the City of Toronto Act, 2006 (COTA), as required by legislation. As part of the review, the Province sought input from municipalities, organizations, and residents. To help make sure the Province heard from Torontonians during this review, the City of Toronto conducted a public consultation between October 21 and November 6, 2015 including a public meeting and an online survey. The purpose of posting this data set is to create a record of the consultation and the public's input.
title: City of Toronto Act (COTA) Consultation, 2015

notes: This subject-based controlled vocabulary is used to tag content and improve search results in the 311 Knowledge Base and Toronto Meeting Management Information System (TMMIS).
